login_info: After logging in, you will gain access to additional features, such as asynchronous bulk data download.
download_started_message: Your bulk download request has been initiated. You can monitor the download status from your personal menu later.
error_download_message: Failed to initiate bulk download. Please try again later.
bulk_note_html: Note: This panel shows your initiated bulk downloads. Downloads will be automatically removed two days after completion.
confirm_cancel_download: Are you sure you want to cancel this download?
cancel_download_failed: Failed to cancel download. Please try again.
confirm_remove_download: Are you sure you want to remove this completed download?
remove_download_failed: Failed to remove download. Please try again.
bulk_error: Error loading bulk download status. Please try again later.
select_spatial_extent_help: Click CTRL-key (meta-key on Mac) and left mouse to select the desired spatial extent and click the "APPLY" button. Click the "CLEAR" button to clear the selection
select_spatial_extent_help_apply: Click CTRL-key (meta-key on Mac) and left mouse to select and apply the desired spatial extent. Click the "CLEAR" button to clear the selection
users_intro: Below is the list of users.
download_size_mb_prompt_add: Enter max download size limit in MB (non-negative integer):
download_size_mb_prompt_edit: Edit max download size limit in MB (non-negative integer):
download_part_size_mb_prompt_add: Enter max download part size in MB (non-negative integer):
download_part_size_mb_prompt_edit: Edit max download part size in MB (non-negative integer):
confirm_remove_user: Are you sure you want to remove this user?
missing_credentials: Missing credentials. Please log in again.
location_help_line1: Name of a location (town, city, state, continent) such as "florence", "italy", "u.s.a", "africa", etc.
location_help_line2: This is a free-form query, so you may search for "rome, italy" or you can also search for a complete address such as "via nomentana, rome, italy". Commas are optional, but improve performance by reducing the complexity of the search
location_help_line3: Click the "Search location" button or the enter key; if the location is found, the selection is updated with the correspondent bounding box
platform_description: Platform from which the observation was made
organization_description: Responsible organization which originated the resource
loc_help: Name of a location where to constrain the search. E.g.: "Italy", "U.S.A.", "Africa"
prot_help: Protocol used to access the data linked to the searched results. E.g.: "HTTP", "urn:ogc:serviceType:WebMapService:1.1.1:HTTP", "OGC:WMS-1.1.1-http-get-map"
format_help: Format of the data linked to the discovered nodes. E.g.: "image/gif", "application/zip"
kwd_help: Keyword which describes the searched result
uselim_help: Limitation applied on the use of the data linked to the searched results
magt_help: The magnitude type of the searched event. This constraint affects only the "IRIS Event" source
instrumentId_help: Identifier of the measuring instruments used to acquire the data
instrumentTitle_help: Name of the measuring instruments used to acquire the data
platformId_help: Identifier of the platform from which the data were taken
platformTitle_help: Name of the platform from which the data were taken
attributeId_help: Id of the parameter described by the measurement value
attributeTitle_help: Name of the parameter described by the measurement value
riverName_help: Name of the river object of measurement
semantic-search-text: Semantic search w/ translations and narrow matches
ontology-search-help:
Exact search or semantic search with ontology support for translations and narrower terms.
Please check the online ontology browser for possible terms:
select-from-ontology: Select a parameter from the ontology
confirm_clear_all: Are you sure you want to clear all constraints?
confirm_clear_all_details: This will reset all search parameters including text, dates, spatial extent, sources, and filters.
bulk_download_initiate_message: This will initiate the bulk download of ${size} resources. The process may take some time, depending on the number of resources and current server load.
bulk_download_monitor_message: You can monitor the download status from your personal menu.
download_name_placeholder: Enter a name for this download
email_notifications_label: Send me email notifications about the download status
status_message_part_ready_more_in_progre: Part ${part} ready: ${fileCount} files, ${sizeMb} MB (more parts in progress)
